tool.name: Computed Tomography Reconstruction
tool.command: export GALAXY_WORKING_DIR=`pwd` && export PROXY_PREFIX=\${EP_PATH%/ipython*} && mkdir -p ./jupyter/outputs/ && mkdir -p ./jupyter/data && cd ./jupyter && export HOME=/home/jovyan/ && export PATH=/home/jovyan/.local/bin:\$PATH && cp /import/imars3d_ui_embedded.ipynb ./imars3d_ui_embedded.ipynb && cp -r /import/__code ./__code && jupyter trust ./imars3d_ui_embedded.ipynb && jupyter lab --allow-root --no-browser --NotebookApp.shutdown_button=True && cp ./imars3d_ui_embedded.ipynb '$jupyter_notebook'
tool.help:
Runs a computed tomography reconstruction interactive tool in Jupyter Notebook.
**NOTE**: Please change the kernel from ipykernel to imars3d before executing the notebook.
More information about each step of the workflow: https://neutronimaging.ornl.gov/ct-reconstruction
